message.entry: Image must be 2-D grayscale or RGB data.
Image data must not exceed size {0} in any dimension. Downsample the image or create a blockedImage before rendering.
The batch dimension of the dlarray must be reduced to a singleton dimension.
The time dimension of the dlarray must be reduced to a singleton dimension.
dlarrays formatted with label dimensions {0} are not supported.

'DisplayRange' values are set to span the range [{0}] based on the image data type, but the data range detected is [{1}]. Manually specify a range or set 'DisplayRangeMode' to 'data-range' to improve the visualization.

'DisplayRangeMode' value of 'data-range' is not compatible with file-backed data and 'DisplayRangeMode' has been set to 'type-range'. Consider manually adjusting 'DisplayRange' to improve the visualization.

'DisplayRange' values are set to span the range [{0}] based on the underlying class of the data, but the data range detected in all visible blocks is [{1}]. Consider manually adjusting 'DisplayRange' to improve the visualization.
'Transformation' must be specified as a 2-D or 3-D transformation object or a valid 4-by-4 transformation matrix.
Adding overlapping opaque images in the Viewer may impact performance. To display an image sequence, consider updating the Image object's Data property directly.
Image must be 2-D grayscale or RGB data. Use 'OverlayData' to visualize categorical data.
Blocked image for 'AlphaData' must match the block scheme for the blocked image for 'Data'.
Image Data must be specified before AlphaData.
The colormap for indexed images must not exceed 256 colors.
